post.body: True, though humans tend to change everything every now and then, so we'll see :)
Haha, definitely start there yes :P
Well, that, or the way internet is used will dramatically change. Think outside the box :)
the internet is changing constantly. Search engines are the hots now, but what next? What when people no longer want to search?
True, that should be a good counter yeah. I'm not saying SEO is bad, because it's not. I'm just curious to look 5 years from now
~not content of someone who knew a trick or two to get better results, and not nessicerally has good content.
Still, I think the whole way of how sites will be ranked is dated, and will (and should) change. Good content should come first,~
Then what use will SEO still have? It's only a matter of time before other search engines kick in and do something similar?
Ha, I guess NameCheap isn't all that nice when it comes to coupon codes. $.81 off? Really? Sign me up! :D
Thanks!
Thanks! I've got one domain with them already, I'll check them out!
Mediatemple doesn't support .me or any extension other than .com, .net and .org
Yep! But I'm glad whenever I can just shut down windows and look at my pwetty OSX, really :D
Ha, that sucks.. Worst part is that GoDaddy's website is HORRIBLE in every way, so why clone it..
Yep, XP is working wonderfully again! Had to use it today again for some korean payment, glad I finished installing yesterday!
And this one, too: http://www.maddogdomains.com/
I want to register a .me domain. Joker sells them for $20, with a minimum of 2 years. GoDaddy has them for $14, and I've got 10% off
Why the hell are you up so early anyway? Working on christmas day?I'm off to REALLYget some sleep now, too late.. -_-
Hell yes make videos! And there's more goodness coming up! :)
(Mac Lover 'n user here! Not since '84 though :)
Being a user of a system for so long doesnt make you blind to the possibility that things COULD go wrong:) Early adopters hurt!
"Bet you won't do that again." -Christopher Titus' Dad.
I'm so glad I didn't upgrade to 10.5.6 yet, that thing seems to be surrounded by bugs..
Ahem, folded*
woah, major typo there.. That's necessary.Ahem.
Is this the end of SEO? http://is.gd/c13t
Can anyone recommend me a good domain registrar to register domains, including .me? TIA!
Uploaded all 14 parts of the japan trip to YouTube, going to post them to the blog now for easy access..
Part 5 of our 'three days in japan, but really just one' trip is now available in HD! Part 6, 7, 8, 9 & 10 coming soon! http://is.gd/dmvM

More Sufjan-stevens-like titled parts coming as soon as the uploads are done & I wake up!

Part 3: The Great Big Void We Call The Ocean. http://tinyurl.com/8uktsd

For y'all twitterers, some early links to our japan trip videos, in HD!
Uploading a bunch of movies of our 'The Days But Really Just One' trip to Japan! Loving YouTube's new upload system btw! Links coming soon!
And I'm back from my short three-day trip to Japan! And my god I'm glad to be! Phew.
